title: It's been 2 days i'm trying to recognize this one... please help !
author: David R

comments.content:
Hi David,  
I think it’s [Gerard Unger](http://web.archive.org/web/20090801152128/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gerard%252BUnger)’s [Amerigo Bold Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20090801152128/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/bitstream/amerigo_bold_italic_ot/?&sample_text=Karamel&sample_size=96), backslanted to make it more upright.  
F

Florian:

THANK YOU so much. I will send your name on the moon.
